sentences.en: A draw seems the best they can hope for.
sentences.cn: 看来他们顶多只能指望打个平局了。

sentences.en: Companies could not draw money from bank accounts as cash.
sentences.cn: 公司不能从银行账户中提取现金。

sentences.en: Draw simple shapes for your child to colour in.
sentences.cn: 画一些简单的形状让孩子涂上颜色。

sentences.en: Draw the basic outlines in black felt-tip pen (see fig. 4).
sentences.cn: 用黑色毡头笔画出基本轮廓（见图4）。

sentences.en: Draw the floss backwards and forwards between the teeth.
sentences.cn: 将牙线在齿间来回拉动。

sentences.en: Draw your child's outline with a heavy black marker.
sentences.cn: 用浓黑色的毡笔画出你孩子的轮廓。

sentences.en: Entry to this prize draw is limited to UK residents.
sentences.cn: 这次抽奖只限英国公民参加。

sentences.en: For the first few years I didn't draw any salary at all.
sentences.cn: 在开始的几年里我分文未取。

sentences.en: he drew on his dressing gown.
sentences.cn: 他穿上晨衣。

sentences.en: He was waving his arms to draw their attention.
sentences.cn: 他正挥手以引起他们的注意。

sentences.en: I’ve never been able to draw very well.
sentences.cn: 我从来就画不好图画。

sentences.en: It won't be easy for you to draw him in.
sentences.cn: 你要让他参与进来可不容易。

sentences.en: Katie had drawn a cottage with a little stream running next to it.
sentences.cn: 凯蒂画了一间小茅舍，旁边流淌着一条小溪。

sentences.en: Keith was drawing a complicated-looking graph.
sentences.cn: 基思在画一张看上去很复杂的图表。

sentences.en: Sarah drew herself up, full of indignation that he should presume to judge her.
sentences.cn: 萨拉挺直身子，为他竟然擅自评价自己而愤慨。

sentences.en: She asked the little girl to draw a picture of the man she’d spoken to.
sentences.cn: 她让小女孩把刚才和她说话的那个男人画出来。

sentences.en: she drew me out and flattered me.
sentences.cn: 她引我说话，还恭维我。

sentences.en: she drew the line at prostitution.
sentences.cn: 她的底限是不去卖淫。

sentences.en: she drew the line at prostitution.
sentences.cn: 她的底限是不去卖淫。

sentences.en: she drew the line at prostitution.
sentences.cn: 她的底限是不去卖淫。

sentences.en: she knew she'd drawn blood when the smile faded from his face.
sentences.cn: 看到他脸上的笑容褪去，她知道自己已经让他感到了痛苦。

sentences.en: She learned to draw by tracing pictures out of old storybooks.
sentences.cn: 她通过描摹旧故事书上的图画学会了画画。

sentences.en: the blow drew blood from the corner of his mouth.
sentences.cn: 这一拳打得他嘴角出血。

sentences.en: the concession will go some way to draw the fire of the government's critics.
sentences.cn: 所作让步将在一定程度上使政府的批评者转移火力。

sentences.en: the nights were drawing in fast.
sentences.cn: 夜很快变得越来越长。

sentences.en: the transition was long and drawn out.
sentences.cn: 这个转变长而又长。

sentences.en: they instructed an attorney to draw up a sales agreement.
sentences.cn: 他们指示法律代理起草销售协议。

sentences.en: We delved through a sackful of letters to draw the winning name.
sentences.cn: 我们把手探进一袋信件中抽取获奖者。

sentences.en: We need a win — a draw won't do at all.
sentences.cn: 我们需要一场胜利，平局根本不行。

sentences.en: We were happy to come away with a draw against Sweden.
sentences.cn: 我们很高兴能和瑞典队战平。

sentences.en: You have to know what's what and when to draw the line.
sentences.cn: 你必须搞清状况以及自己的底线。

phrases.tran_cn: 拉开；收回；退却；使保持距离
张力调整杆；拉深压边筋；拉道
吸引火力，代做靶子，招致批评（以转移批评方的注意力）
(板球)比赛结束时拔掉（三柱门的）门柱
以…为最后界线，限制，拒绝

trans.tran_en: the final result of a game or competition in which both teams or players have the same number of points
to produce a picture of something using a pencil, pen etc

trans.tran_cn: 画，移动，拉，拖，拔出，吸，抽，支取（钱），推断出，作比较，吸引，引起（…注意），打成平手
trans.tran_en: to produce a picture of something using a pencil, pen etc
